title: Contemporary Diamond-studded Gold Bracelet (BRAC114)
materials: 30 stones). Features Hyderabadi polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: Modern square-shaped link design. Every other link features a cluster of brilliant-cut diamonds set in a secure bezel setting. The bracelet showcases a combination of solid and openwork links, creating a lightweight yet visually striking piece. Features a secure lobster clasp.
colors: Rose gold with dazzling white diamonds.
occasions: and gifting. A stylish addition to any modern woman's wardrobe.
description: This bracelet perfectly blends modern design with the timeless appeal of diamonds. The use of rose gold adds a touch of warmth and sophistication, while the secure diamond settings ensure lasting brilliance. Lightweight and comfortable, it's ideal for daily wear. A perfect gift representing enduring beauty and modern elegance.
